Class Portlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.faces.component.UIComponent
      javax.faces.component.UIComponentBase
          javax.faces.component.UINamingContainer
              com.icesoft.faces.component.portlet.Portlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.faces.component.NamingContainer, javax.faces.component.PartialStateHolder, javax.faces.component.StateHolder, javax.faces.component.TransientStateHolder, javax.faces.component.UniqueIdVendor, javax.faces.event.ComponentSystemEventListener, javax.faces.event.FacesListener, javax.faces.event.SystemEventListenerHolder
public class Portlet
extends javax.faces.component.UINamingContainer

The Portlet component is a naming container that is used to wrap any ICEfaces page fragment that is designed to be deployed as a portlet. Currently, it's main purpose is to provide the proper namespace to the portlet's component heirarchy by
